item.title: Spring-spring-components
item.description: Spring5 新特性 - spring.components Author: HuiFer 源码阅读仓库: SourceHot-Spring 解析 相关类: org.springframework.context.index.CandidateComponentsIndexLoader 测试用例: org.springframework.context.annotation.ClassPathScanningCandidateComponentProviderTests.defaultsWithIndex,org.springframework.context.index.CandidateComponentsIndexLoaderTests CandidateComponentsIndexLoader是怎么找出来的,全文搜索spring.components 使用介绍 下面是从resources/example/scannable/spring.component
